thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: Amy Simso Dean
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Amy Simso Dean

author: Amy Simso Dean
title: Amy Simso Dean
text:
My new telescope arrived FAST. But that's not the best part.
This company has graciously supported my youth birding club in the past and now again by donating 30 hats for the kids... without me even asking. The kids will be so thrilled!
This is a company that supports the birding community and I for one will offer them my wholehearted support in return.
